txt.en:
'You will encounter many Dragon-clan while you roam the fields here. You would do well to thin their numbers, though I doubt we can be certain of their being truly gone from this area for a number of days yet.

'The Dragon-clansmen are many, but their numbers cannot be endless. You should be merciless when these evil Men attack you, [placeholder].

'They do not know mercy themselves. They showed none to my poor husband and his kin.'

'You slew a good number of them, [placeholder]. For that, I am grateful. Your thirst for vengeance against the evils in this world is greater than my own.\n\n'You should return to Lhan Tarren; the fires of a village are warmer than the words of a lone widow in the wilds. Aye, [placeholder], you have done enough!'
'I wish you would not venture out again, but if you must, you must.'
While you are attempting to set the farm to rights, Blodwen anticipates that you will encounter many Dragon-clan as you roam.
Dragon-clan invaders can be found all over the Herd-lands.\n\nYou should defeat the Dragon-clan invaders as you wander throughout the farmlands.
Return to Blodwen in the Herd-lands
Blodwen can be found hiding among the rocks at the far southern edge of the Herd-lands in Trum Dreng.\n\nYou should return to Blodwen and see if she has any more need of your assistance.
